resources.string: What Timestamp is it now? \n(Just long-click timestamp to copy)
Uses Greenwich Observatory Time. You might use this when needed to use standard time.

"For example, I will show the display of the date of 2007-09-10 06:32:08 PM. 'a' means AM/PM. 'y' means Year. 'M' means Month. 'd' means Day of month. 'H' means Hour of day. 'm' means Minutes. 's' means Second. \nAs a result, you have to set the following form: yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss a \nIf you want the diversity of date format, look at this. 'yy' displays '07'. 'LLL' or 'MMM' displays 'Sep'. 'LLLL' or 'MMMM' displays 'September'. 'E' or 'EE' or 'EEE' displays 'Mon'. 'EEEE' displays 'Monday'. 'h' displays '6'. 's' displays '8'. 'H' displays '18'. "

"Changelog
 
1.6.0.2 : 16-radix Timestamp checkbox crash bug, minus(-) input bug fixed. Sorry for inconvenience. 
1.6.0.1 : Notification error in Oreo fixed, and some buges fixed. 
1.6 : Some UI modifications for some machines, and you can use Hex Timestamp(Datestamp) or user-defined format for notification. Thanks for Sunny Saini's suggestion. You can add more formats in 'Manage User Formats' in Timestamp-Date Converter screen menu. 

Timestamp Calculator 1.6.0.2(90) 
This application works with just simply printing timestamp. If you use this, I will regard as you agreed my rules. 

1. This is just free application, thus you can use not limited. Also, I do not discriminate. Yet, If this application have distributed with a fee, that's illegal and would punished. 

2. If you edited my project, you cannot discuss about any problem to me. I guarantee this app that has original codes, therefore if you edited code, you cannot interpellate to me. Instead, if my code has any problem, then I can help you. If my application has bug, compose an e-mail to illustrious@inu.ac.kr. I really hope you will find a bug.

3. This app has copyright, you must not duplicate my code except when permitted by me. If you edited my code and you thought that is *my copyright*, you can write copyright with me. Also copyright of your code will absolutely protected."
Check this so that save GMT(UTC) checkbox values.
No timestamp was inputted. Input it first.
No timestamp was entered. Convert it first.
No timestamp was printed. Calculate it first.
Shows Timezone when timestamp or date result shown.
Set timestamp max length. If it is null or bigger than 14, will be resetted.
Check this value if you want to use 24-hour system.
Really do you want to delete all items?
Really do you want to delete this item?
Really do you want to delete checked items?
This item will be duplicated, thus not added.
When using Timestamp to Date Converter, you can get the result immediately. Button will disappear.
There is too many formats. Delete all or certain formats to make new formats.
When use timestamp-date converter, you may need a tooltip or not.
Cannot convert due to wrong date format.
If you want to know your location, you must turn on the GPS. Proceed?
Use Vibrator when clicking widget or notification.
Set the font size of the widget(dp unit).
Set the font size of the notification(dp unit, use proper size or layout issue will occur because of limited area).
Use Hex Timestamp(Datestamp) Notification. Notification setting must be activated.
"Use user-defined formatted Notification such as 'yyyy-MM-dd'. Notification setting must be activated."
